title: European Quest
inclusions_evidence: Services of an Expert Trip Manager, Driver Team & Local Guides

hotel.name_or_hint: Various hostels and hotels across Europe

other.notes: Costs for hotels and experiences are estimated based on averages.

reasoning: The deal offers extensive inclusions and experiences that would be challenging to replicate at a lower cost independently, but exact DIY pricing could not be determined.
additional_notes: The deal does not include flights, which would need to be factored in separately.
